About Lindale City Council

The Lindale City Council is composed of a mayor and 5 single member district council members, elected at-large for 3-year terms, to represent the citizens of the City of Lindale.

City Council Meetings

The Lindale City Council meets on the 1st and 3rd Tuesday of each month at 6 p.m. at the Lindale City Hall, 105 Ballard Drive. Any person wishing to address the council on agenda items or under citizen talk time must sign up prior to the meeting, a signup sheet will be provided at the door the day of the meeting.  

Agendas are posted on the city website and the bulletin board at City Hall 72 hours prior to the meeting(s). Copies of the agendas are available at the city secretary’s office or on this website.
